name: Drive Act 3 Hardcover!
blurb: The sci-fi comedy from three-time-Eisner-nominated cartoonist Dave Kellett! Get Act 3 (...or Acts 1, 2, 3) of the graphic novel Drive!

name: Shi: Omnibus Edition Vol. 1 Kickstarter Exclusive!
blurb: Billy's Tucci's classic is collected in this Premiere 488-pg. Full-Color Hardcover Omnibus Edition!

creator.name: Billy Tucci and Crusade Fine Arts, Ltd.

name: Åshöjdens BK – volym 3 och 4 + lyxig SAMLARBOX!
blurb:
Nu kompletterar vi utgivningen av serieromanen Åshöjdens BK med volym 3 och 4. 
Dessutom en samlarbox för samtliga fyra volymer!

name: ShortBox: a box full of fun and fine indie comics
blurb: A box full of 5 new independent comics encompassing fantasy, horror, cooking recipes, romance, and more!

name: How to Webcomic: The Ultimate Guide to Making Online Comics
blurb: Learn to make your own webcomic from a webcomics veteran of 10+ years. Let's get the book printed!

name: Nectar: Trans Femme and Non Binary Erotic Comics Anthology
blurb: An erotic anthology of delicious, nourishing naughtiness, where each comic has one (or more!) trans femme or non binary main character

name: The Out Side - real life trans & nonbinary comics anthology
blurb: Journeys to truth and self-acceptance from 16 comic artists. Foreword by Julia Kaye.

name: RAGE - a graphic novel by Jimmy Palmiotti & Scott Hampton
blurb: This new hardcover graphic novel for mature audiences tells an action packed, dramatic tale of survival amongst global chaos!

name: PACIFIC RIM Ultimate Omnibus
blurb: The deluxe collection of 5 Pacific Rim original graphic novels and the upcoming Pacific Rim: Blackout prequel to the Netflix series.

name: Días De Consuelo
blurb: An intimate graphic novel by Dave Ortega about family and migration during the Mexican Revolution as told to him by his abuela.

name: ERIS #2
blurb: The explosive 2nd issue of the sci-fi action series ERIS.  A 32 page full color comic.

name: Lipstick Traces
blurb: A collection of nightlife comics from T. Alixopulos
